channel.title: [317] ~~~| 3p1c-Scap3 Source | ~~~ [317]
channel.description:
---> [url=http://uppit.com/O265V9]Download Now![/url]
Hey all,
This is my first source. So don't comment too bad :|. But the only bad thing about this is, i couldn't get any screenshots! It's a long story and I'm not up to explaining it, lol! I'll add them as soon as I can though! Anyway, I'll try to tell you the most I can about it.
Commands: Note: Remember to ad :: in front.
beastwep (I added for Glowing Dagger) dragonweps dragonarmor runes (You get 100 of each, and it's for all players (0)) starter (250M, 100M Mantas, D scim, Whip, Torso, D legs..) pk shops train train2 jad 1v1 players afk
I can't think of all of them right off hand but I'll update this everytime I remember something! :) The training isn't too hard or too easy. Money isn't too hard to make or too easy! It's about medium concerning those things. Nice starting look and starter :D! It has working Clan Wars and Jad! And by the way, as soon as I am able to get more info and pictures, I'll add them ASAP! Also has a very nice 1v1 place. A lot of shops, but in V2 I will be relocating them.
Sorry for such the small post but, as soon as I can get some nice pictures and stuff I'll add! Remember this is my first source release so I'll be making a V2 with new Home area and shops and more! So answer my poll!
I hope you like it! Credits: The Soul And me
---> [url=http://uppit.com/O265V9]Download Now![/url]

item.title: [317] ~~~| 3p1c-Scap3 Source | ~~~ [317]
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

Next time, get rid of the character files.
Also, this has 100 errors in it, Seems as if you missed a } when adding commands.

I type in my username and password and leave the Server spot blank and leave the port the way it is. (43594)
    public static int serverlistenerPort = 5555; // 43594=default

Read full topic

item.title: [317] ~~~| 3p1c-Scap3 Source | ~~~ [317]
item.dc:creator: @1_Pk3r_1 1 Pk3r 1
item.description:
@1_Pk3r_1 wrote:

Well I can just explain. It’s simple.

I finish editing and doing all I need to do to the source. I click on runserver, and it says it’s online. I go to the webclient to log onto my server and take pictures.

I type in my username and password and leave the Server spot blank and leave the port the way it is. (43594)

I press login. And it says, “Error Connecting To Server.”

So I try doing, 0.0.0.0 and 127.0.0.0 and 127.0.0.1 and localhost and nothing works!

So I don’t know what to do now. I can’t take pictures So if you can help me that would be great!

Read full topic

item.description:
@1_Pk3r_1 wrote:

I just can’t seem to log into my server. I have done this before and everything went fine! I logged in and it was fine. But now, I’m making a source and can’t seem to log in. So therefore I can’t take pictures

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @1_Pk3r_1 1 Pk3r 1
item.description:
@1_Pk3r_1 wrote:

—> Download Now!

Hey all,

This is my first source. So don’t comment too bad :|. But the only bad thing about this is, i couldn’t get any screenshots! It’s a long story and I’m not up to explaining it, lol! I’ll add them as soon as I can though! Anyway, I’ll try to tell you the most I can about it.

Commands:
Note: Remember to ad :: in front.

beastwep (I added for Glowing Dagger)
dragonweps
dragonarmor
runes (You get 100 of each, and it’s for all players (0))
starter (250M, 100M Mantas, D scim, Whip, Torso, D legs…)
pk
shops
train
train2
jad
1v1
players
afk

I can’t think of all of them right off hand but I’ll update this everytime I remember something!
The training isn’t too hard or too easy. Money isn’t too hard to make or too easy! It’s about medium
concerning those things. Nice starting look and starter :D! It has working Clan Wars and Jad!
And by the way, as soon as I am able to get more info and pictures, I’ll add them ASAP!
Also has a very nice 1v1 place. A lot of shops, but in V2 I will be relocating them.

Sorry for such the small post but, as soon as I can get some nice pictures and stuff I’ll add!
Remember this is my first source release so I’ll be making a V2 with new Home area and shops
and more! So answer my poll!

I hope you like it!

The Soul
And me
